column4: Just installed breezy on on a machine with a 16M voodoo graphics card.  Only resolution I have available is 640x480.  Tried making sense of xorg.conf man page but no luck.
try setting the bit depth to 16 or 8, read your xorg.log and see what it says about the other resolutions (prolly not enough memory)
I doubt it's a memory issue, I've had 1024x768 with badger.  Depth is set to 16 and xorg.conf has all modes from 1280 down in each of the colour modes.
well, you can doubt, and then you can know.. so check the log..
